seed_pair.known: 学中文不容易，但很有趣。
seed_pair.target: Learning Chinese isn't easy but it is fun.

practice_phrases: Learning Chinese isn't easy
学中文不容易
Not easy
不容易
I know learning Chinese isn't easy
我知道学中文不容易
You know learning Chinese isn't easy
你知道学中文不容易
Are you sure learning Chinese isn't easy?
你确定学中文不容易吗？
I know you know learning Chinese isn't easy
我知道你知道学中文不容易
Learning Chinese isn't easy when you can't remember how to say words
当你记不住怎么说词时学中文不容易
I know learning Chinese isn't easy but I want to learn
我知道学中文不容易但我想学
You don't mind that learning Chinese isn't easy
你不介意学中文不容易
Are you sure you know that learning Chinese isn't easy?
你确定你知道学中文不容易吗？
